definition: constitutional in the structure of something (especially your physical makeup), a fertilizer that is derived from animal or vegetable matter
details:
adjective
- constitutional in the structure of something (especially your physical makeup)
= synonyms: constitutional
- involving or affecting physiology or bodily organs
= example: involving or affecting physiology or bodily organs
- simple and healthful and close to nature
= example: simple and healthful and close to nature
- relating or belonging to the class of chemical compounds having a carbon basis
= example: relating or belonging to the class of chemical compounds having a carbon basis
- being or relating to or derived from or having properties characteristic of living organisms
= example: being or relating to or derived from or having properties characteristic of living organisms
- of or relating to foodstuff grown or raised without synthetic fertilizers or pesticides or hormones
= example: of or relating to foodstuff grown or raised without synthetic fertilizers or pesticides or hormones
noun
- a fertilizer that is derived from animal or vegetable matter
= synonyms: organic fertilizer, organic fertiliser
